orderedElements.name: formatcode
orderedElements.m_sValue:
<style>
  .flex-item {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  }
  .flex-item-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    object-fit: cover;
  }
  .flex-item-content {
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    flex-grow: 1;
  }
  .flex-item-full-image .flex-item-image-full {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    z-index: 0;
  }
  .flex-item-open-image {
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-right: 0px !important;
    padding-left: 0px !important;
  }
  .flex-item-open-image .flex-item-image-open {
    width: calc(100% + 2px);
    max-height: 200px;
    object-fit: cover;
    margin: -1px -1px 0;
  }
  .flex-item-full-image .flex-item-content {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    color: white;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
  }
  .flex-item-full-image::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    z-index: 1;
  }
  .flex-item h3 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }
  .flex-item p {
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }
  .flex-item-footer {
    margin-top: auto;
  }
  .flex-item-footer a {
    color: #0a8a0a;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  .flex-item-footer a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  .icon {
    font-size: 24px;
    color: #0a8a0a;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }
  .flex-item-full-image h3 {
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-shadow: none;

}
  

.flex-item-content {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  height: 100%;
}

.flex-item-body {
  flex-grow: 1;
}

.flex-item-footer {
  margin-top: auto;
}

.button-container {
  text-align: center;
}

.button-flex {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background-color: #00703C;
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.button-flex:hover, .button-flex:focus {
  background-color: #005B31;
}

.link {
  color: #00703C;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.link:hover, .link:focus {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
</STYLE>
